thread.title: SSE extends unplanned outage at Britain's Aldbrough gas storage
thread.title_full: SSE extends unplanned outage at Britain's Aldbrough gas storage

title: SSE extends unplanned outage at Britain's Aldbrough gas storage
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Wed, Sep 16, 2015, 10:33 BST - UK Markets close in 5 hrs 57 mins SSE extends unplanned outage at Britain's Aldbrough gas storage Reuters - UK Focus – 3 minutes 27 seconds ago 1,444.00 +2.0000 
LONDON, Sept 16 (Reuters) - An unplanned outage affecting deliverability at Britain's Aldbrough gas storage site will now likely end on Sept. 22, its operator SSE (LSE: SSE.L - news ) said in a market update. 
The outage, which cut the site's ability to receive gas by 122.5 megawatt hours, began on Tuesday afternoon is expected to end at 6 p.m. (1700 GMT) next Tuesday, SSE said. (Reporting by Susanna Twidale, editing by Louise Heavens) Tax cuts, pensions, childcare, online accounts and beer duty, here's … Related Stock Articles Follow the quotes you care about most.
